summary: The MkDocs AI summary update log highlights the introduction of AI intelligent summary functionality, read time statistics, and smart caching. Version 1.2.0 introduces multiple AI service support, intelligent service switching, multi-language summaries, content cleaning, and adaptive environment configuration. It also features a robust caching system, flexible configuration options, API integration, error handling, and display optimizations. Planned functionalities include multi-AI service support, automatic API selection, and secure API key handling, among others.
page_title: MkDocs AI 摘要更新日志
